description: .38 Special ammunition with 130gr FMJ bullets. This bullet has been imbued by a druid's will and pollen will explode on landing, which can blind and slow.
.38 Special ammunition with 130gr FMJ bullets. This bullet has been magically shaped by an Earthshaper to turn into fragments upon impact.
.38 Special ammunition with 130gr FMJ bullets. This bullet has been imbued with fire from a Kelvinist.
.38 Special ammunition with 130gr FMJ bullets. This bullet has been imbued with ice from a Kelvinist and will try to freeze enemies in place.
.38 Special ammunition with 130gr FMJ bullets. This bullet has been imbued with lightning from a Stormshaper and will bounce from enemy to enemy.
.38 Special ammunition with 130gr FMJ bullets. This bullet has been tinkered with by a technomancer to corrupt robotics.
